short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlights LinkedIn feed content from specific people

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily notice LinkedIn feed content from the people you want to engage with.

Enter the keywords to look for in people's titles, posts, and comments, and have those highlighted in your feed. 

You can also paste specific people's LinkedIn profile URLs and get their content highlighted.
